{"id":1182824770,"question_id":3308,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1708589475,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"97 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1182824770/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Apply Operations to Make String Empty","memory":"30.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int letter[26] = {};\n    string lastNonEmptyString(string s) {\n        for(char c: s) letter[c - 'a']++;\n        int ma = *max_element(&letter[0], &letter[26]);\n        vector<char> v;\n        for(int i = 0; i < 26; i++){\n            if(letter[i] == ma) v.push_back(i + 'a');\n        } \n        string ans = \"\";\n        for(int i = s.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--){\n            auto it = find(v.begin(), v.end(), s[i]);\n            if(it != v.end()){\n                ans += s[i];\n                v.erase(it);\n            }\n            if(!v.size()) break;\n        }\n        reverse(ans.begin(), ans.end());\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"apply-operations-to-make-string-empty","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
